name: Maze (itch) (RtkArt)
description:
While looking for some classic Halloween fun you entered a corn maze not knowing that it was actually a trap set by a farmer doing the bidding of demons! You must escape by any means necessary before your soul becomes dinner for a demon.

My first finished game, created for the Senscape Adventurous Game Jam. I wanted to do a lot but I am just happy with what I accomplished in the end. Enjoy!

Created with the help of:

Barn by Gabro Media - For the barn and windmills.

Essential Pickups and Small item Sounds by Essential Audio - For items

Exland by Alexandros Demetriades - The landscape material blueprint

Ritual Decal Pack by Vector Arts - For my demonic circles.
